content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Green makes to achieve his purpose of persuading his fellow African Americans to join the Union forces.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Green makes to achieve his purpose of persuading his fellow African Americans to join the Union forces.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
